EmailTemplate.description: Lead owner has not changed status to 'end' after 7 days
EmailTemplate.name: AP Lead status owner Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Outstanding Salesforce.com Lead
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.OwnerFullName}, This email has been automaticlly generated by Salesforce.com to indicate that the Lead Status of the following lead {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName} of {!Lead.Company} in the {!Lead.Lead_Queue__c} has not be changed to "End" in 7 days
You can access the lead by clicking on the following link: {!Lead.Link} Please follow the lead management process to change the lead status to 'End' when you have completed processing the lead.
If you have any questions please contact the DIMC AP Key User: Name: Korapat (Kate) Sutthiprapa Email: Korapat.Sutthiprapa@tha.dupont.com
Please note that the DIMC AP Key User will receive notification if this lead continues to be outstanding
Regards, DuPont Inquiry Managament Centre Asia Pacific
